**Summary**
• Trump wants to rebrand the Department of Defense as the Department of War to ditch the "woke" vibe.
• The move is part of his broader effort to shake up the military and appeal to his base.
• Critics are already calling this a pointless PR stunt that won’t fix actual defense issues.
Impact — This rebranding push could stir up controversy and divide opinions on military naming conventions.
